alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 01 at 8:57PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. While strong winds will end around 3 AM MST across the Tooele and Rush Valleys, stronger winds are now expected to persist until 5 AM MST across Western Millard and Juab Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Crosswinds may contribute to difficult driving conditions especially on east to west oriented routes, including I-80.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
